page.title: 02 FASHION AND BEAUTY
page.content: {Fashion, Beauty And Life Style Most Women if they want to look glamorous wear make-up daily, and get their hair done monthly. The present fashion is a straggly perm with wet gel on to hold it in place and plastic butterfly clips. To go with this, they wear a suit of three quarter length trousers with a baggy jacket and roll up sleeves. The colour is a light pastel that is suited best on cotton material. To complete the outfit the shoes are leather and flat heeled. They also have a flower pattern cut into the shoe. The necklaces are coloured a pastel colour as well. To match the suit we also have large button shaped earings to match the suit. If women wear tights they have all different kinds of various colours.They also have a bow at the heel.
